long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Note: Your Ultimate Note-Taking Companion

Transform the way you capture and manage your thoughts with Quick Note, the powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your note-taking experience. Whether you're jotting down meeting notes, creating to-do lists, or reflecting on your day, Quick Note has you covered with a suite of intuitive features:

Effortless Note Creation: Choose from customizable templates like Meeting Notes, To-Do Lists, and Journal Entries to start capturing your ideas in seconds.

Smart Category Management: Organize your notes efficiently with categories. Add, edit, or delete categories seamlessly and receive notifications if you try to delete a non-existent category.

Dynamic Search and Filtering: Quickly find what you need with our powerful search and filter functionality. Search by text, tags, or categories to locate specific notes in a flash.

Visual Note History: Track changes and view a detailed history of your notes. Monitor all actions, including additions, edits, and deletions, with timestamps to keep track of your note-taking journey.

Enhanced User Interface: Enjoy a sleek and modern design that includes dark mode for comfortable viewing at any time of day. Our interface is designed to be user-friendly and visually appealing.

Integrated Sharing: Share your notes directly via email with a single click. Perfect for collaborating or sending reminders.

Automated Note Expiry: Ensure your note history remains relevant with automatic deletion of old history items after a set period.

Quick Note is your all-in-one solution for managing your notes efficiently and effectively. Install now and experience the future of note-taking!
